column5: You'll find us tucked away in the hills of Pipe Creek, TX just off 46, right between the charming cities of Boerne and Bandera. Come enjoy the beautiful views of the hills, the water, and the wildlife! Youâ€™ll love the location, the people, the coziness, and the tranquility. It's an amazing retreat for couples, solo adventurers, or families (with kids), and well behaved furry friends (pets) are also welcome.
